---
name: MFA1_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae MFA1 promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the MFA1 gene encoding the a-factor mating pheromone precursor in S. cerevisiae. This promoter is cell type-specific and active in MATa cells during mating response.
